law.catch_line: A person who submits a claim for payment or for reimbursement for services or benefits or makes a st...
law.text: A person who submits a claim for payment or for reimbursement for services or benefits or makes a statement in connection with a claim for payment or reimbursement for services or benefits pursuant to § 5-4A-05 of this subtitle which the person knows or should know is false, misleading, or fraudulent is guilty of perjury and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $10,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 2 years or both.
